price: Òun ni Ẹni tí Ó ṣẹ̀dá yín. Aláìgbàgbọ́ wà nínú yín. Onígbàgbọ́ òdodo sì wà nínú yín. Allāhu sì ni Olùríran nípa ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُمۡ فَمِنكُمۡ كَافِرٞ وَمِنكُم مُّؤۡمِنٞۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī khalaqakum faminkum kāfirun waminkum mu'minun wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
